eventName: Such is the Joy of Our Reunion
storyInfo: Blaze goes to Ding Feng Lou to take part in the Chef Selection for the Feast of a Hundred Delicacies; coincidentally, Leizi is investigating there. Out of sheer luck, Blaze stumbles her way through the qualifiers and meets Mo Bufu, when the Ding Feng Lou venue suddenly catches fire.

attributes.content: Welcome to Ding Feng Lou.
attributes.name: Mannered Server

attributes.content: Wow... So this is the place everyone's talking about.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Are you... nervous?
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Huh? Don't think I should be.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The competition is nigh, and yet, I feel... apprehensive, somehow...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: I mean...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Nothing to fear! The Young Chef said it was fine.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Besides, it's not like we're trying to be cooks here. We're just on the hunt for that legendary chef, right? To ask him for his tangerine cake recipe.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Cold comfort, but I suppose at this point that's all I'm getting...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: It's about time. All spectators please remain here for now. Competitors, follow me.
attributes.name: Uptight Examiner

attributes.content: If you get anything difficult thrown at you, don't bluster, just keep calm and think. There's always a way...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Relax, okay? I'll see you.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Please, sit.
attributes.name: Uptight Examiner

attributes.content: While I know you're here for the exam, you're still one of our guests. Please, let me offer you some tea first.
attributes.name: Uptight Examiner

attributes.content: The examiner picks up the teapot from the table and pours Blaze some tea. Her nose is immediately filled with the fresh, sweet scent.
For a competition, you're all being pretty friendly here...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Well, can't say I haven't been thirsty. Thanks!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze grabs the teacup and drinks it up.
As she does, the examiner places a pen and paper before her.
This pot of tea is infused with several ingredients. Please write them down.
attributes.name: Uptight Examiner
Blaze
attributes.content: PFFTH—

attributes.name: Blaze
attributes.content: *cough* *cough* *hack*... What?!
Blaze glances down at her cup, naught but a bead of tea left on the side. She looks up at the examiner, polite smile still plastered over his face.
Could I, uh... have another cup?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Today looks like a bust to me. They've gone through dozens of people since morning, and nobody's even passed the first stage.
attributes.name: Laidback Chef

attributes.content: Our head chef is being too harsh on them. It's like a revolving door over there—No one can last longer than a minute.
attributes.name: Bored Chef

attributes.content: A chef's third eye is their tongue. If their tongue's not good enough, they can't be that good a chef.
attributes.name: Laidback Chef

attributes.content: So, no point wasting the head chef's time if they can't even pass stage one. May as well send 'em home sooner.
attributes.name: Laidback Chef

attributes.content: Hey, hey, 'scuse me, madam, this is the kitchen. Are you—
attributes.name: Laidback Chef

attributes.content: Judicial Review Office investigation. If I could have both your assistance.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Keep calm... keep calm...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What did Mechanist tell you? The human tongue can only taste four flavors, but the nose can tell between over a hundred...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Not that I ever smelt anything from his 'Machine Oil' moonshine, though...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze gingerly cradles her cooling teacup once more, and takes a careful sniff of what aroma remains.
Smells flowery. That's probably jasmine...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: No, not just jasmine, there's a kind of... right, chrysanthemum! Just like the table tea at the Young Chef's place!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Okay, aside from that, there was definitely a sweet-sour kind of flavor as I drank it...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: None of the initial flavors were sour, so what was that aftertaste...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Sweet, acid, and a little puckery... kind of familiar?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Why'd you want me to try this plum wine, anyway?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It's a specialty here in Baizao, you see.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: There's a plum forest north of the city. When summer sets in June and the plums are fresh and ripe, the people pick them to steep in wine—ideally a Xiaohan wine.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Mmm... wine made from mossoats like this just has a particular flavor to it. It goes perfect with plum.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Steep it for about three months, and it's ready just in time for Mid-Autumn.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Plum wine, huh... So it's got history?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Earlier, you asked me what happened to all the people we lost building Baizao, right?
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: I wouldn't say it's got history, really. It just strikes me... during those awful times back then, pickled plums were a worker's staple.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: And some years after finishing Baizao, that plum forest sprang up in the mountains north of us. No one knows exactly when it did, nor who planted it.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: So it's a way of... remembering them, kind of?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: At least they were never forgotten.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Once the plums are ripe next year, we can go to the mountains to see together.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Here's my answer.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Jasmine, chrysanthemum, green plum, Mount T'ien blossom, rock sugar... Xiaohan wine?
attributes.name: Uptight Examiner

attributes.content: I've heard there's a plum forest north of Baizao.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The plums in June get brewed for Mid-Autumn. I'm guessing the plums in this were picked earlier than that, which is why there's still a mouth-puckering taste in it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The alcohol steamed away while boiling the tea, and left just the sweet-sourness of the plum. Plus the mild and subtle aroma from the flower...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It wasn't obvious when I drank it down, but the aftertaste really stays with you... I'd really like another cup!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Identifying the first few flavors is reasonable enough, but you're the first one today who's been able to point out the use of Xiaohan wine.
attributes.name: Uptight Examiner

attributes.content: So... I'm right?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Are you not sure about your own answer?
attributes.name: Uptight Examiner

attributes.content: No! No, of course not! Of course I don't... Haha...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Then congratulations on passing the first stage.
attributes.name: Uptight Examiner

attributes.content: Please, follow me upstairs.
attributes.name: Uptight Examiner

attributes.content: From the rear hall sounds a gong, and the doors next to Blaze yawn open.
First stage...? How long is this thing...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Here you are, madam. The list of chefs at Ding Feng Lou.
attributes.name: Ding Feng Lou Chef

attributes.content: If you don't mind me asking, what are you investigating exactly...?
attributes.name: Ding Feng Lou Chef

attributes.content: ...The case is confidential. I'm not at leisure to tell you for now.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Ding Feng Lou Chef

attributes.content: The head chef here, their name is Mo Bufu?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Yes. I don't think there's a cook in Baizao who doesn't know of Chef Mo.
attributes.name: Ding Feng Lou Chef

attributes.content: Do you know what his occupation was prior to Ding Feng Lou?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: That, I have no idea. Chef Mo arrived... just under ten years ago? Not quite a long time, but not short either. His cooking skills are the real deal, they're sublime. Almost straight away, he succeeded the previous head chef.
attributes.name: Ding Feng Lou Chef

attributes.content: Where is he now? I need to see him.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: I'm really sorry, but he's holding an exam right this moment. There's no way he can meet you.
attributes.name: Ding Feng Lou Chef

attributes.content: Exam? What exam?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: You could call it an enrollment exam for Ding Feng Lou? It only happens once every few years.
attributes.name: Ding Feng Lou Chef

attributes.content: If you're interested, we're televising it right here!
attributes.name: Ding Feng Lou Chef

attributes.content: That contestant...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Blaze...?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: This is...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Isn't this a restaurant...? How come this room's set up like a study?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: In its centuries of history, Ding Feng Lou has hosted countless reputed celebrities. We set aside this room to safekeep any pieces of calligraphy or painting gifted by them.
attributes.name: Uptight Examiner

attributes.content: Delicacies, calligraphies, paintings... all are works of art that take years of practicing.
attributes.name: Uptight Examiner

attributes.content: Blaze looks up and around. Hundreds upon thousands of silk threads hang from the ceiling, a wooden placard tied to each one, resembling a curtain.
All of these are... names of dishes...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: As you're no doubt aware, Ding Feng Lou is hiring chefs in the runup to the Feast of a Hundred Delicacies. This calls for cooks who are not just culinarily skilled, but who grasp the significances behind the dishes they make.
attributes.name: Uptight Examiner

attributes.content: Every dish here originates from a past Feast of a Hundred Delicacies. Pick one placard, and tell me the dish's history. That is today's second stage.
attributes.name: Uptight Examiner

attributes.content: (From the FEASTS? How the hell should I know any of these?!)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (Whatever, I've gotten this far—)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze closes her eyes, and swipes one down. The neighboring placards clatter against each other, as if an endless windchime.
What's this...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: 'Medley of Whites'?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze barely knows how to cook anything. Passing the first stage was already a miracle.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: She spent basically her whole life in Victoria. How could she possibly know any of these stories...?
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Blaze... I really wish I could help you...
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: You have a time limit. Do you know the origin of this dish?
attributes.name: Uptight Examiner

attributes.content: About fifty years ago, give or take, Yan's Grand Preceptor presented the True Lung with a dish—the simplest, plainest, stewed radishes.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But the special thing was, the radishes she used came from all over the land, and each one had a massively different flavor and texture.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But having been stewed for long enough, they absorbed enough broth and were all equally tasty.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I hear Yan's always put education first, but because the country's so big, and every city has wildly different circumstances anyway, the farther out you go, the harder it is for students to really achieve.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The Grand Preceptor was trying to tell the True Lung that every student, no matter their background, should have equal opportunity.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The True Lung took the Grand Preceptor's advice, advocated hard for educational reform, tore down any regional restrictions and brought equality to educational resources.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The next year, when Baizao Academy announced its successful applicants, students from remote regions made up more than a half of the thousand-plus that qualified.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: In the decades after that, the Tianshis buried in their Bureau's books, the students studying like hell in their academies, all of them thanked the Grand Preceptor for boldly advising...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: That, if I'm not mistaken, is what Medley of Whites represents...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze senses the spectators stop chattering.
She's not wrong. Everyone is nervously watching her right this moment.
(How... did Blaze know that?)
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: (And why would the exam writer leave the name of this dish in there...?)
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: (You don't just mention her, not in front of everyone...)
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Did I, uh, say something wrong...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Interesting.
The voice descends from a few meters above. Blaze stares up above her, but doesn't see anyone.
A foot lands on a stairstep plank with a dull thud, subdued yet powerful, the kind nobody could miss.
It approaches, closer and closer, until Blaze can finally make out who it is—a stern and solemn man, far older than her, alighting from his long stairwell.
After so many years, I didn't think anyone would remember this.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Nice to meet you, um...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The story you've told is far older than you. Girl, how come you know it?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Well, someone from my family told me it, a long long time ago.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: He said he was one of those students in poverty, all the way back then.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: To know the spring of your water... I imagine your relative was a grateful and righteous man.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: But as for you...
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Just what motive brought you here?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: I... well, I'm... here to compete, of course...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Seeing as you've made it here, I'll give you one chance.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Final stage. No frills, no fuss. Make me a 'dish'.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Come.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Too early for dinnertime, the restaurant is almost empty save for a couple of diners. There's no waiters, no proprietor, and even the kitchen is quiet.
Excuse me...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You, young man! Help me out!
attributes.name: Penniless Diner

attributes.content: I was in a hurry this morning and forgot my money. You're a well-to-do boy, anyone can tell! Be a kind man, spot me a little!
attributes.name: Penniless Diner

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm not here to rip you off. Here, take this family jade for now. Once I grab the money later, I'll pay you back.
attributes.name: Penniless Diner

attributes.content: Not that I mind lending you... but couldn't you just tell the owner instead...? We're total strangers—how would you find me and pay me back?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: No, no, no, you see, this jade's not your average thing, it's not fit for just anyone to take. I'm only entrusting it to you because I can tell, you've got a rare air about you.
attributes.name: Penniless Diner

attributes.content: A-Alright...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Zuo Le rummages for some loose coins in his pocket, and hands them to the diner, whose face immediately broadens with delight.
When do you plan to pay me back...? Where would we meet?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We'll meet if we do and we won't if we don't. And if we don't, you can just go ahead and pawn this jade off.
attributes.name: Penniless Diner

attributes.content: Relax, relax. You've made a favorable deal today, young sir.
attributes.name: Penniless Diner

attributes.content: So saying, the diner is gone out the restaurant door in a blink, disappearing into the crowds.
Pawn... it off?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: There's my dish. Pretty good job, wouldn't you say?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...Longevity noodles?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Mo Bufu's hands rest on the table, chopsticks in his grasp. For a while, silence, before he finally picks up the spoon and tries a mouthful of soup.
Blaze examines Chef Mo's face closely, but the satisfied look she's hoping for simply does not blossom across the old man's face.
These noodles... this soup base, who taught you this?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: It was this tiny little chef. I really put my back into learning it, too...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The owner of 'Savors at Yu's'. Who is he to you?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: How come you know...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I thought so...
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: ...The disgrace of him!
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I see he has talent and give him the chance to display his skills. He's not grateful for that, fine. But now, now he even sends an amateur to humiliate me!
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: What's happening? Blaze finished it up with no trouble... nothing should be wrong with the flavor.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: ...Does Mo Bufu know the Young Chef somehow?
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: Wait! Okay, hold on!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm sorry! I know you can probably tell I suck at cooking at a glance, but I didn't come so I could wreck your competition!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I just have a question that only you can answer!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I grew up in Victoria, see, and this relative of mine who lived far away in Yan would always send me these tangerine cakes. They were so sweet and tasty...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I've been on the hunt ever since I came to Baizao, but I still haven't found that flavor...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I was thinking, since you're the best chef in all of Baizao, maybe you would know!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: A single pastry? You thought it was worth entering this competition to meet me, over a single pastry?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: I have tons of other questions still! But this is the only one I can solve on my own. This is the one clue, the one link I have to my family!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: ...The greatest taboo when making tangerine cakes is to blindly add sugar. That is, to mask the poorness of your craft and ingredients with sweetness.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: I don't know of anyone skilled enough to make tangerine cakes that are sweet and yet taste good on their own.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: You've asked your question. Now go.
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: Wait—
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: A muffled sound from above interrupts the two. Blaze and Mo Bufu look up at the same time, but both of their faces get struck by something wet.
Why is it leaking in here...?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: No... this is oil!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: And the moment she says it, the lamp suspended from the dome ignites in a blink, becoming a fireball—
Get outta here!
attributes.name: Blaze
